Package model.players

Class GamePlayer

java.lang.Object
model.players.GamePlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<GamePlayer>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Goalkeeper, Striker
public abstract class GamePlayer extends Object implements Comparable<GamePlayer>
This class contains all the actions and values a player has.

  • Method Details

    • isPlayerHasBall

      public boolean isPlayerHasBall()
      Checks if the player has the ball.
      Returns:
      true if the distance between the player and ball is less than 55, false if not.
